name: originals_episodes_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webtoon.
Tool description: This API provides the largest webcomics data in the world to create a comic site/application such as webtoons.com
API description: List episodes of a comic
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

titleno.description: The title number of the comic, obtained from endpoints like .../originals/titles/list or .../originals/titles/list-by-rank.

language.description: The language code for the episodes. One of the following: 'en', 'zh-hant', 'de', 'fr', 'es', 'th', 'id'. Defaults to 'en'.

pagesize.description: The number of episodes to fetch per page. Maximum is 20. Defaults to 20.

startindex.description: The starting index for paging. Defaults to 0.
